title: The Eve of Our Generation
description: The Eve of Our Generation is a poetry book that embarks on two journeys. One follows the slices of life of protagonist Jasmine, the Queen of Crayons and Paper Flowers, the other dives into the stream of consciousness of author Keanu Joaquin Del Toro. Complete with illustrations by the author himself, follow a series of acts as you feel, relate, and see vulnerability through poetry in a whole new light.
author: Keanu Joaquin Del Toro
